title: Open Textbook Development Workshop for Open Educational Resources

context.prior_knowledge: Basic document editing skills and educational content development experience
context.additional_context: Learners are office/administrative professionals with social sector expertise, conducting practice using personal devices

learning_goals: Understand the legal and technical characteristics of open educational resources and select appropriate license types.
Produce drafts of three or more open textbooks using markdown and open-source tools.
Continuously improve educational materials by applying feedback incorporation and version control systems.
Design a basic survey tool (5+ items) for evaluating learning effectiveness.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
